title: Equipment review: Cobra AMP Cell irons
data: More Golf: Leaderboard | Rankings | Schedule | Equipment | FedEx CupI've been using the Cobra AMP Cell irons all summer and fall and just haven't gotten around to posting anything on them yet.I've really been pleased with their performance, however, and decided to do a little Q&A to celebrate.What's your favorite thing about the clubs?I'm not that good at golf but these things are easy to hit. I especially love the high irons and wedges -- I've probably hit the gap wedge more than all the other clubs in my bag combined this year. It's my ultimate "oh crap, what am I doing, I need to get out of this" club.Do they look good?They're fantastic. They come in silver, orange, blue, and red and I have the silvers. For a company so brash at times with its attire, they sure do make a slick-looking club.Do you have a video?Yes, I'm glad you asked!These three goofballs all love the clubs, too.Where can I buy these?How about at Cobra Golf. And are they costly?Nope, on sale for $499So how would you rank them?8/10Wait, eight? I thought you said you loved them?I do love them but they aren't the best irons in the world. I think they're a little bit underrated -- and a great value right now at $499 -- and I'm going to keep using them. But there's room for improvement which is why I can't wait to see what Cobra comes out with next.For more golf news, rumors and analysis, follow @EyeOnGolf and @KylePorterCBS on Twitter or Google+ and like us on Facebook.
